October 9, 1964
Mr. Lee £. Campion, Director
Division of Educational Communications
University of the State of Hew York
Albany, Hew York 12224
Dear Lee,
During the ensuing year we would like to prepare a speakers* guide
listing individuals throughout the United States who are prepared to
speak on educational broadcasting. As you know, there Is a great
demand for speakers for PTA’s and various civic organizations. Would
you please look at the enclosed guides for ideas, then compile one
which might be appropriate for the NAEBY
Include names of speakers from the various regions. We will send your
suggestions to other committee members and ask them to add additional
names and within the next several months I hope we can have a guide
which can be published for the NAEB members.
Sincerely,
Marion Corwell
Associate Director
MC/hJk
ce: Harold Hill
